aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We're passionate about helping people reduce their energy consumption and environmental impact. PowerWise combines AI technology with practical advice to make energy efficiency accessible to everyone.
aboutUs.mission: Our mission is to make energy efficiency simple, engaging, and effective for every household.

free.question: Is PowerWise free?
free.answer: Yes! You can start using PowerWise for free. We may introduce premium features in the future.

smartDevices.question: Do I need smart home devices?
smartDevices.answer: Not at all. PowerWise works without any connected devices — just your phone and motivation.

aiPersonalization.question: How does the AI coach personalize the experience?
aiPersonalization.answer: The AI learns from your home details, your goals, and your past activity to recommend the best next steps.

savings.question: How much can I expect to save on my energy bills?
savings.answer: Most users see savings of 15-40% on their energy bills within the first few months, depending on their home and how consistently they follow the recommendations.

privacy.question: Is my data secure and private?
privacy.answer: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data and never sell or share your personal information with third parties.

callToAction.title: Ready to Start Saving?
callToAction.description: Join thousands of users who are already reducing their energy bills and environmental impact with PowerWise.
